Adam Cath
Work Experience
5/2005 – Present
Adobe Systems, Inc.

Designed products, led development teams, and implemented features for multiple shipping products. Made 2,437 check-ins, fixed 715 bugs, and filed 411 bugs in 9 products. Inventor on 2 pending patents. Promoted focus on the user, strove for simplicity, and deleted lots of code.

8/2011 – Present
Product Design Lead — Project Monocle

A profiler and dynamic analysis tool for games and highly interactive applications. Now used by every major online gaming company (Rovio, Zynga, Kixeye, Rumble, Epic, etc).

  • Chose C++/Lua architecture and created initial codebase to provide high performance (for gigabytes of profiling data) and flexible, usable UI.
  • Led product design. Created UI wireframes. Managed visual designer to produce and integrate final visual designs. Established design principles and worked with feature devs to apply them.
  • Created primary data analysis features: frame-time graph to find problems, low-level activity report to diagnose them, and call tree to find hot functions.
  • Created novel 3D analysis feature: profile OpenGL/OpenGL ES/DirectX content on any device, replay/modify 3D commands in Monocle.
8/2011 – Present
Developer — Flash Runtime
  • Created an accurate sampling profiler for the Flash virtual machine.
  • Created instrumentation layer for 3D playback engine described above.
5/2011 – 8/2011
Lead Developer — Performr

An internal dashboard for tracking software benchmarks. Now used by several major projects.

  • Led a team of 3 to create application in Flex, PHP, and MySQL.
9/2007 – 5/2011
Developer — Flash Catalyst

An interaction design tool that transforms UI mockups into working UIs. Java, Flex, and Eclipse.

  • Co-created the core document model, which translates between the underlying generated code and the visual, editable document.
  • Created features that allow a designer to convert artwork into working UI components with states, interactivity, and animation.
  • Created novel visual refactoring feature: user drags an object between documents, Flash Catalyst rewrites underlying code to fix up document tree, coordinate space, variations across states, and attached animations and behaviors.
  • Led a team of 8 to create the central feature for version 2: allowing arbitrary code into a project.
  • Worked with Flex team to design the underlying language, balancing machine readability, human readability, and expressiveness.
Summer 2005 & 2006
Intern — Flex & AIR

A cross-platform SDK and runtime for highly interactive applications. Mac/Windows native programming, C++, and ActionScript.

  • Created various APIs in the SDK, including native clipboard/drag/drop support, UI automation, installers.
Throughout Adobe Experience
  • Gave keynote product demos at Adobe's flagship MAX conference in Los Angeles (audience >4000) and Tokyo (audience >1500). Gave tutorial sessions, which received excellent student reviews. Helped hundreds of customers through online forums.
